channel.title: I have port forwarded ebfore, now I can't...?
channel.description: I'm using the same set up, only a different monitor and tower, but I NEVER had a router. How did I fricking port forward earlier, because it wont let me now, every tut I follow I need a router...

item.title: I have port forwarded ebfore, now I can't...?
item.description:
@332083 wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:5, topic:241622”][quote author=Guthix Rule link=topic=317979.msg2522065#msg2522065 date=1225941680]
I have gotten my server to run WITHOUT portforwarding and i do have a router but it works no more?
[/quote]
You can make your server RUN without portforwarding, but people CAN NOT log onto it.
I don’t care what you say to that, it’s the fact.[/quote]
My friends helped me test it.
5 different computers at one time.
I port forwarded from a guide from this website, and some fag deleted that guide.

Read full topic
item.source: I have port forwarded ebfore, now I can't...?

item.title: I have port forwarded ebfore, now I can't...?
item.description:
@332083 wrote:

tonypker13:

It’s a lie, or you’ve used UTorrent. You MUST have a router to portforward, period.0

I port forwarded never having heard of torrent clients.

I have utorrent now.
The preferences thing and all, but it still wont let me port foreard.

All I have is a phone modem, and a cable internet modem.
It’s all I’ve EVER had.

Read full topic
